Dedalus.algorithms.greedy_optimization module¶

Greedy optimization algorithms for optimal kp-set calculation

class GreedyOptimization(graph)[source]¶

Bases: object

Greedy optimization algorithms for optimal kp-set calculation

optimize_kpp_neg(kpp_size, kpp_type) -> (<class 'list'>, <class 'float'>)[source]¶

It iteratively searches for a kpp-set of a predefined dimension, removes it and measures the residual fragmentation score. The best kpp-set will be that that maximizes the fragmentation.

Parameters:
  • kpp_size (int) – the size of the kpp-set
  • kpp_type (KeyplayerAttribute.name) – Either KeyplayerAttribute.DF or KeyplayerAttribute.F
Returns:

  • S: [EXPAND]
  • best_fragmentation_score: [EXPAND]
Raises:
  • TypeError – When the kpp-set size is not an integer number
  • WrongArgumentError – When the kpp-type argument is not of type KeyplayerAttribute.F or KeyplayerAttribute.DF
optimize_kpp_pos(kpp_size, kpp_type, m=None) -> (<class 'list'>, <class 'float'>)[source]¶

It iteratively searches for a kpp-set of a predefined dimension, with maximal reachability. m-reach: min = 0 (unreachable); max = size(graph) - kpp_size (total reachability) DR: min = 0 (unreachable); max = 1 (total reachability)

Parameters:
  • kpp_size (int) – size of the kpp-set
  • m (int) – maximum path length between the kpp-set and the other nodes of the graph
  • kpp_type (KeyplayerAttribute.name) – Either KeyplayerAttribute.mreach or KeyplayerAttribute.DR
Returns:

  • S: [EXPAND]
  • reachability_score: [EXPAND]
Raises:
  • TypeError – When the kpp-set size is greater than the graph size
  • WrongArgumentError – When the kpp-type argument is not of type KeyplayerAttribute.mreach or KeyplayerAttribute.DR
